comics.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
comics.author: Nick Spencer
comics.description: Peter Parker faces new challenges as Spider-Man in this thrilling continuation of the Spider-Man series.

comics.title: Batman: The Long Halloween
comics.author: Jeph Loeb
comics.description: A gripping detective story featuring Batman as he tries to uncover the identity of the mysterious Holiday killer.

comics.title: Saga
comics.author: Brian K. Vaughan
comics.description: An epic space opera about a family trying to survive in a war-torn universe.
